* Iron Raptor suddenly snapped her head towards Shadow as he moved, thinking 
it rather clever to not reply until now...while their guard was obviously 
down.
Her body moving almost as if it had a mind of its own.
Stepping infront of Prowl as Shadow unloads the clip, she snapps her arm 
infront of her face, a large black and red shield with the Maximal symbol 
with three silver claw slashes behind it brandeshed on the face as it 
extends from the top and bottom of her left arm plate.
The bottom extending all the way to her waist, her legs automatically 
bracing as the charges hit the shield.
It was amaizing!
It was if she wasn't in controle, but her mind was just watching while her 
body moved to its own accord!
Her voice low and with more of a deadly edge to it then she ever knew she 
had.*

" I don't think so!"

* But then the shield seemed to slide right beck into her arm as she wheeled 
it around to extend, leaving her right arm to come up behind her head, her 
fingers wrapping around something that felt familier but she didn't even 
know was there.
With a ring of steel her arm pulled upward, revieling the flashing blade of 
a broad-sword.
Without a single movement to betray her actions she lifted the sword high 
into the air, the blade seeming to shimmer in the early afternoon sun.
A helm seemed to come up from the back of her neck, her hair seeming to 
disappear into the armor as it covered her head. Just as black as the rest 
of the suit. All except the silver face-plate which covered her mouth and 
nose.
Now, if never before, she liiked like a real knight, brandeshing a sword 
over her head.
Her voice sounding cold  with a twist of brutal sarcasm behind it.
The sword held high.*

" What time is it Mr.Wolf?"

* In one fluid movement her body shifted, straining in the armor to make it 
move faster then it was made to.
Sparks flying up from the joints as she took two very quick steps, armor 
screeching as she brought the sword down in one fluid stroke.*

" Your time!!!"

* And with that, the blade glew blue for one split second before and energy 
slash was released from the blade, hutting the ground as it sliced towards 
Shadow.
Iron Raptors body left in still ness, the blade's tip touching the ground 
with her head forward, watching the energy slash heading for her target.
All the time thinking...<where the hell did all THAT come from?!!>*
